pages.text: I think we can both agree that there are a ton of mobs in the game! I'm sure you've wanted to bring one home, but it was either too far away, too violent or too big. $(br2)Well, you can craft a cage or jar and you're able to capture almost every mob in the game! This makes for much easier transport or just display.

This of course excludes things like bosses, Ice & Fire dragons, etc., so basically, just try to jar or cage all the mobs to find out which ones can't be captured! $(br2)$(italic)(I will soon make a list of things that cannot be captured)
